name: LIV-CONNECTED, INC.
firms: PROSPERING SOLUTIONS, LLC FKA JOHN C. SNYDER III
sampleDescriptions: HR-5198- To amend the definition of manufactured home in the National Manufactured Housing Construction and Safety Standards Act of 1974.
Passage of HR-5198. Will allow for a change to the HUD regulations that allow manufactured homes to no longer be required to be on wheels. will allow for cheaper HUD approved options.
Advocating for the passage of HR-5198. The enactment of the bill would allow for affordable housing to be more readily available to the public by changing HUD regulations.
